amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding for the American Climate Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 199 - 197 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 199 - 197 (Roll no. 363).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
